2009-12-05T09:52:00.000Z	etfb		My laptop crashes when I wake it up from Suspend.  Is this a common complaint?  It used to be fine, but some time during the life of my Jaunty installation it stopped working.
2009-12-05T09:53:00.000Z	arghh2d2	etfb	you need twice as much swap as you have ram for hibernation to work right..dont know about suspend
